name: UpdateProjectDataCache
description:
Update the data cache for a Vercel project.

This tool updates the data cache feature on a specified Vercel project. Use it when you need to refresh or modify the data cache to ensure the project is up-to-date with the latest changes.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Vercel project to update the data cache.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique Team ID to perform the request on behalf of. Required for targeted updates.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of. Use this to specify which team's project to update.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: disable_data_cache
parameters.description: Set to true to disable the project's data cache, or false to enable it. Default is false.

value_schema.description: Enable or disable data cache for the project - default: false

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Enable or disable data cache for the project - default: false

value_schema.description: Enable or disable data cache for the project - default: false
